text: Ayoob Falih Hasan Al-Rubaie (), born 1978, known by his nom de guerre Abu Azrael (, literally "Father of Azrael") , also known as the "Angel of Death" (Arabic: ملأك الموت‎), is An Iraqi Commander in the popular crowd of the Kataib al-Imam Ali, an Iraqi Shi'a militia group of the Popular Mobilization Forces that is fighting ISIS in Iraq. He has become a public icon of resisting ISIS in Iraq among Shia Iraqis with a large following on social media. His motto and catchphrase is "Ella Tahin" (Arabic: إلّا طحين‎), literally meaning "Until/into dust" interpreted to mean "Grind you to dust." Abu Azrael was a former member in Muqtada al-Sadr's Mahdi Army which fought against the United States during the U.S.-led invasion of Iraq. ==Personal life== Abu Azrael is described in various sources as a Shia Muslim who is a 40-year-old former university lecturer and a one-time Taekwondo champion. According to an Iranian source, he has a master's degree in physical education.http://fa.abna24.com/service/states/archive/2016/08/18/707508/story.html Reports from March 2015 claimed that Azrael is a father of five, and lives an "ordinary life" when not on the battlefield. Following incidents where he was filmed desecrating the corpses of ISIS fighters, Azrael stated that he had been told by a senior imam in Najaf that he should pray for penance and "never do such a thing again".http://www.theaustralian.com.au/news/world/the- times/shia-hero-abu-azrael-regrets-butchering-dead-daesh-prisoner/news- story/56df83bc7bda9b1e5c033209eafafa47 In October 2019, he was severely beaten unconscious by protesting Iraqis at Tahrir Square, Baghdad.Mosul joins the protests in Iraq but in a different way, Al-Monitor In 2020, he was infected with COVID-19 and suffered lung damage. ==Public image== Abu Azrael is currently fighting against ISIS although he has also fought against other militant groups. He has attracted attention in the Middle East, but by the spring of 2015, he had also made front-page appearances on international news websites in England, France and the United States. He has received a medal of honor from the Representative of the Supreme Religious Authority Sayyid Ahmad al- Safi.http://fa.abna24.com/service/middle/archive/2015/05/24/688572/story.html In 2016, he was spotted on the battlefield in the Battle of Mosul.http://fa.abna24.com/service/middle/archive/2016/11/01/711026/story.html ==See also == * Harith al-Sudani * Abu Tahsin al-Salhi * Salam Jassem Hussein * Chris Kyle * Azrael ==References== Category:Living people Category:Members of the Popular Mobilization Forces Category:Iraqi Shia Muslims Category:Iraqi military personnel Category:People from Baghdad Category:1978 births Category:People of the Iraqi Civil War
